CustomField.description: Enter the date format to be used in billing for items using this tax rate. Date format should be entered in Java simple date format such as dd/MM/yyyy or MM/dd/yyyy. If the time zone cannot be determined, the running Users locale is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the date format to be used in billing for items using this tax rate. Date format should be entered in Java simple date format such as dd/MM/yyyy or MM/dd/yyyy. If the time zone cannot be determined, the running Users locale is used.
CustomField.label: Date Format
